****** Test << & >> operators ******

Input values for A and B: 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000 1000000000000000000000000000000000000001

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000001

****** Test += operator ******

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000001
C = 0

C = B += A

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = 2000000000000000000000000000000000000001
C = 2000000000000000000000000000000000000001

****** Test -= operator ******

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000001
C = 2000000000000000000000000000000000000001

C = B -= A

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = 1
C = 1

****** Test unary - operator ******

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000001
C = 1

C = B = -A

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = -1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
C = -1000000000000000000000000000000000000000

****** Test boolean operators ******

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000001

A != B
A < B
A <= B
B > A
B >= A
A is not equal to 0
B is not equal to 0

****** Test increment and decrement operators ******

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000
B = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000001

cout << A++ << A
1000000000000000000000000000000000000000  1000000000000000000000000000000000000001

cout << B-- << B
1000000000000000000000000000000000000001  1000000000000000000000000000000000000000

cout << ++A << A
1000000000000000000000000000000000000002  1000000000000000000000000000000000000002

cout << --B << B
999999999999999999999999999999999999999  999999999999999999999999999999999999999

****** Test overloaded type cast to double operator ******

A = 1000000000000000000000000000000000000002
B = 999999999999999999999999999999999999999

A cast to a double is: 1e+39
B cast to a double is: 1e+39

계속하려면 아무 키나 누르십시오 . . .
